div.div: Following Governor Abbott’s announcement, all public schools are to remain closed for the remainder of the 2019 – 2020 school year. Please check the Mabank ISD district home page, facebook, and twitter for further information and updates.

p.span: Please click the above image for an important message regarding all public schools remaining closed for the remainder of the 2019 – 2020 school year.
